title: 'Free tickets + $50 for Melania movie': Craigslist Ad offers money for documentary, says 'must remain in seats for entire film'
summary_full: Despite claims of a fast sell-out, a new documentary about Melania Trump's private life reportedly saw nearly empty theaters on opening night in Boston. An advertisement offering free tickets and $50 to attendees in Boston went viral, highlighting sluggish ticket sales nationwide and internationally.
